name: The last of Trolls
description:
The last of Trolls - is a hardcore 2D platformer which tells us about the Troll’s life story.
In this game your basic aim is doing various levels playing like a Troll. There are four bags with gold on every twelfth levels.
You have to collect all of them to do the next level. But don’t think it will be so easy: you will meet different obstacles like sharp swords and enormous traps.
Please, be very careful and attentive. Think of your every step and movement and the people’s traps won’t be so hard. Go ahead!

KEY FEATURES:

1) Nice graphics with soundtracks
2) Hardcore gameplay
3) A large variety of levels
